function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hesitance in the real estate industry to modify ways and invest in sustainable and green buildings","Impact":"Lack of sustainable construction could lead to additional greenhouse gas emissions and increased energy costs","Mitigation":"Implement legislative responsibilities or incentives to encourage sustainable construction practices","Technologies":"Green building technologies, energy-efficient systems","People":"Real estate industry, construction industry","Owner":"Legislators, industry leaders"},{"Description":"Population mobility and transport systems as essential elements in the transmission of infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease spread due to improved interconnectedness and mobility","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control population mobility and improve public transportation safety","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, transportation monitoring technologies","People":"General population, travelers, commuters","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, transportation agencies"}]}
